vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 6 to the professional services contract with Arcadis CE, Inc. f/k/a Malcolm Pirnie, Inc. to provide additional engineering services associated with water quality improvements at the Elm Fork Water Treatment Plant - Not to exceed $7,497,216.00, from $34,063,406.00 to $41,560,622.00 - Financing: Water Capital Improvement G Fund
